Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the waiver of licensing fees for accessible taxi-cabs and for-hire vehicles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Waiver of licensing fees for accessible taxi-cabs and for-hire vehicles.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the licensing and regulation of high-volume for-hire transportation services
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Licensing and regulation of high-volume for-hire transportation services.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing minimum payments to for-hire vehicle drivers and authorizing the establishment of minimum rates of fare
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishing minimum payments to for-hire vehicle drivers and authorizing the establishment of minimum rates of fare.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to conducting a study of the impact vehicles for hire have on the city of New York, and authorizing the commission to establish and revise vehicle utilization standards for high-volume for-hire services and to regulate the issuance of new licenses to for-hire vehicles
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Conducting a study of the impact vehicles for hire have on NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a maximum number of for-hire vehicles affiliated with each base
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishing a maximum number of for-hire vehicles affiliated with each base.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring half of all black cars to be accessible to persons with physical disabilities
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring half of all black cars to be accessible to persons with physical disabilities.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the siting of for-hire vehicle bases
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
